637370.name: Warhammer 40,000 Eternal Crusade - BELIAL War Pack
637370.description:
We are the Adeptus Astartes. We are the finest warriors of humanity. We must purge this vile sickness from Arkhona. We have redoubled our efforts and victory remains just out of reach. Yet we remain vigilant. We fight on!

When Belial, Grand Master of the Dark Angels Chapter's elite Deathwing Company, witnessed the forces of Chaos being unleashed by Abaddon on the Orks, he mustered the Space Marines of Arkhona and he told them: Will we let the dark gods clean these lands only to make them dirtier with their own heresy? The Emperor is expecting our sacrifice, it is the price for Redemption!

Will you hear his call and be a loyal servant of the Emperor? If you do, then why not stand out in the middle of melee with the Belial War Pack? It includes the Champion weapon and armour pack(for the Space Marine faction) and 10,000 RTCs to customize your warrior furthermore.
637370.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
